website_summaries.verdict: Silicone-free formula that also strengthens the skin against future damage.
pros: Many users reported instant visible results as the gel dries
Works on various types of wrinkles, including forehead creases, lines between the brows, crow's feet, laugh lines, and fine lines around the lips
cons: Needs to be rubbed in well under make up to prevent foundation beading up

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: Really didn’t notice a difference in my skin. Product is expensive and you do not get much. Strivectin’s neck cream is great, but other products have all fallen short for me.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa S.

customer_reviews.title: Reduces appearance of fine lines
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product for couple of years and find it to work very effectively in reducing the appearance of fine lines on my upper lip and around eyes. I do stress fine lines, not deep lines. I feel worth the cost of the product.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn

customer_reviews.title: ... the deep-set wrinkles as much as I would have liked.
customer_reviews.text: Using this product did not reduce the deep-set wrinkles as much as I would have liked.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: The wrinkles win
customer_reviews.text: It's impossible for a wrinkle filler to do as claimed because it's effect disappears very soon after use.It would need to be more resistant to movement of the face
customer_reviews.author: A. Mary Mc Evoy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is AWESOME! I definitely see a big difference using it under my makeup! It smoothes everything out.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Shops

customer_reviews.title: I believe it works
customer_reviews.text: I believe this works to diminish the "appearance" of fine line and wrinkles. That being said its expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa T.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on something that doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I paid way too much for this product and it feels and looks like there is no difference before and after using this very expensive product. What a waste of good, hard earned money.
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: I used it for two weeks. At first I thought it was helping, but when I wash my face, the lines and wrinkles are still there. I will not buy it again. The price is outrageous. Neutrogena works as well (not very) for much less.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Preer

customer_reviews.title: Value for cost
customer_reviews.text: Initially, I thought it was going to be a great product with good results. However, a month out from starting to use it and I see minimal results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff! ❤️ Used my sisters and she has ...
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff!❤️ Used my sisters and she has been using for 4 days.. I thought she had some work done when I saw her.. She didn't.. It was this stuff. Ordered some and waiting for it to come tomorrow!
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: This did nothing for fine lines around my mouth
customer_reviews.text: Sorry. This did nothing for fine lines around my mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Nukkles

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did not see much difference in my skin than before.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne K. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: I dont see any difference I have fine lines and doesn’t do anything for me personally. But everyone is different
customer_reviews.author: Paige Lipoma

customer_reviews.title: Love it, definitely recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Strivectin for about a year faithfully, and very pleased. I am a 58 year old woman, and have used many products. This product worked after a day and night! Shocking, but true. I thought was wishful thinking, so,I tried it alone, and it is totally different then the cream or serum, it actually filled my deep wrinkles. Not gone, but to see any difference in such a short sign gives me hope, plus it is a product that gets better with use. I would recommend for mature skin.
customer_reviews.author: connie

customer_reviews.title: If you can commit to (and afford) it, this stuff works
customer_reviews.text: As with any product for wrinkles, the longer you use this, the better your results will be. The other thing to keep in mind is that you need to be consistent. You’re not going to “lose progress” if you miss a night, but being more dedicated consistently will definitely give you better results. I did find that this filler, specifically, works well- especially with wrinkles between my eyes - though it also has shown improvement in the creases around my eyes as well. I would say it works marginally better than other products I have used that are a bit less expensive, but this one feels excellent going on and seems to keep moisture and softness in my skin longer.
customer_reviews.author: J. Salzenstein

customer_reviews.title: No Visible Difference in My Wrinkles After Several Weeks of Application
customer_reviews.text: I've used StriVectin High-Potency Wrinkle Filler lotion for a few weeks now and can say that the product does have my face and neck feeling baby soft, but I do not see any visible difference in my wrinkles. I'm 54, and have a few on my face and forehead that I would love to lessen the appearance of. This container is 15 ml - that's one half of an ounce. Tiny container with a huge price tag. I also notice a build up of product on my face after I use this - almost like I put clear fingernail polish on my face and its now peeling. Not a good feeling. Wrinkle filler? I wish.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela V

customer_reviews.title: Haven't noticed any improvement
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this filler for a few weeks and I haven't noticed any improvement in the lines between my nose and mouth. The instructions say to apply the cream and then allow it to dry. Once the cream is dry it does feel like my skin is tighter and the lines are less visible. The drying cream seems to pull the skin taunt, and makes the wrinkles less visible. But once I start to apply my moisturizer and makeup, the filler absorbs the moisture and my skin relaxes back into its normal wrinkles. So works for a few minutes, but doesn't have staying power.
customer_reviews.author: TooManyHobbies

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: I'm a little ambivalent about this product. I'm 37 with a little sun damage, fair-medium skin and freckles, I don't have any extreme lines but the ones in my forehead seemed smoothed by this lotion when I'm not making any facial expressions. It sinks in nicely and no adverse effects. I'm not totally on board because of the price point and amount of product. This is a small pump tube. A little goes a long way, but I certainly wouldn't pay more then 15 bucks for it. There's no huge improvement for the price.
customer_reviews.author: H.F.

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is legit! I received a sample pack ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is legit! I received a sample pack of this product with another order, and after three days of using it I'm convinced my forehead wrinkles are smaller, so much so that I'm ordering the whole bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Results on lip lines after three weeks
customer_reviews.text: If it weren't so expensive I would give it five stars. I've been using it exclusively on my top lip lines for three weeks now and I have seen an improvement! My lines/wrinkles are not gone but they are noticeably diminished so I'm thrilled. I followed the instructions to put it on after I wash my face morning and evening. I let it dry and then add my SPF moisturizer and CC cream. I'm a believer.
customer_reviews.author: D. Tobin

customer_reviews.title: Another excellent product from StriVectin that uses impressive ingredients.
customer_reviews.text: StriVectin does a really good job with its products. The main reason like them is that they include some impressive ingredients in their products, and this one does that. It absorbs very easily into the skin. A little bit goes a long way. I don't detect any kind of fragrance at all. It didn't leave any kind of oily residue.
customer_reviews.author: Bold Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Another winner
customer_reviews.text: StriVectin products are the only wrinkle products that I have consistently come back to and used for the last ten years. This filler is supposed to reduce the look of lines and wrinkles. While I don't really have deep lines and wrinkles, I want to prevent the ones I have from getting any worse. There are no miracle products. Period. But I have found through trial and error what works for me and Strivectin products, particularly their excellent retinol eye cream, are a favorite. I recommend giving them a try. I have been rarely disappointed in this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Misuzmama

customer_reviews.title: Good Brand
customer_reviews.text: StriVectin is a nice brand and I thought the wrinkle filler would be a good choice. I used this product on my "marionette" lines by my mouth. The product is very lightweight and didn't cause any irritation. I didn't find that it made the wrinkles go away that quickly, but it's something that I will use when more lines appear on my face.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: I don't have noticeable wrinkles on my face, so I use all my anti-wrinkle products on my hands, and feet. According to StiVectin I should have noticed an immediate change and then a long-lasting softening. I noticed neither. Complete waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Keleigh Crigler Hadley, author of Revenge Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. It has softened my forehead wrinkles so much. No scent and easy to carry and use. Its not oily or greasy, jist auper nice to use.
customer_reviews.author: K. Cade

customer_reviews.title: but fine lines on my forehead
customer_reviews.text: I'm in my mid 30s. Not major wrinkles, but fine lines on my forehead, between eyebrows, & nasolabial folds. Did not notice any difference after a month of use.
customer_reviews.author: L Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Not effective so far
customer_reviews.text: Jury is still out on this and I will update as I keep using it but so far I'm not that impressed. I notice no difference in any wrinkle or line and the "filling effect" is not so much. I know nothing really will completely fill in wrinkles but so far this has done absolutely nothing.
customer_reviews.author: imsocrazy

customer_reviews.title: not a good look during the day
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for about a week and not really seeing a difference. Not sure if I used too much, but gets kind of a build up and starts kinda peeling, not a good look during the day. It stings a bit when you first put it on, but it stops after just a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: German Girl with a Spanish Name

customer_reviews.title: Haven't Seen Any Benefits
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t seen any visible benefits to this particular product. StriVectin is always touted as being a wonderful brand but this particular item just seems to add another product to my facial routine without delivering much difference.
customer_reviews.author: ⛵⚓Seas the Day⚓⛵

product_meta.title: StriVectin High-Potency Wrinkle Filler, 0.5 Fl Oz
product_meta.description:
The silicone-free formula was designed specifically to work on the appearance of forehead creases, vertical lines between the brows, crow's feet, laugh lines, and fine lines around the lips. Skin appears more radiant and luminous.

BRAND STORY
Bold science. No nonsense results. That’s smart beauty for smart women. That’s StriVectin.
